title: Fix ingest_file duplicate naming + sha dedupe
description: Ingestion fails with 'Could not find a free canonical filename' when re-ingesting same files or too many duplicates. Add sha256-based dedupe (skip if already ingested) and better unique naming fallback.
notes:
Compute sha256 before copy; if rawDir already contains meta with same sha, skip ingest. Remove 25-duplicate limit; add sha-suffix fallback.
Fixed ingest canonical naming collisions by computing sha256 pre-copy, skipping if same sha already ingested in the session rawDir, increasing duplicate suffix search, and adding sha-suffix fallback.

title: MVP: Local-first pipeline + dashboard
description: Ship the first usable local dashboard + ingestion pipeline. Source of truth: plan.md.

title: Scaffold monorepo + tooling
description: Scaffold Bun/TS monorepo (apps/server, apps/web, packages/core, packages/ui) + base tooling (Biome, tsconfig, dev scripts).
notes: Implemented (initial scaffold).

title: PDF extraction (Poppler + fallback)
description: PDF slide extraction: primary Poppler pdftotext when available; fallback to pdfjs-dist; record extractor in meta. See plan.md §8.
notes: Implemented PDF extraction: extract_pdf job caches text using pdftotext when available, otherwise pdfjs-dist fallback. ingest_file enqueues extract_pdf for .pdf slide artifacts.

title: LLM schemas + deterministic Markdown rendering
description: Schema-first LLM outputs (artifact/session/tasks JSON) validated with zod; render deterministic Markdown templates into generated/. See plan.md §9.
notes: Added zod schemas for LLM JSON outputs (artifact/session summaries + tasks) and deterministic Markdown renderers in @syllabusops/core.

title: OpenAI OAuth (PKCE) + Keychain + fallback
description: Implement OpenAI OAuth (Auth Code + PKCE) for model calls with refresh tokens in Keychain and API key fallback; UI connect/disconnect. See plan.md §13.
notes:
Implement OAuth PKCE flow + Keychain storage + API-key fallback and Settings UI.
Implemented config-driven OAuth PKCE flow on server with Keychain-backed token storage + API-key fallback; added Settings UI to configure endpoints and connect/disconnect. See commits d6c8d42 and 9d0652a.

title: Editor revisions list + restore UI
description: Add revisions list + restore controls in the editor using /api/fs/revisions and /api/fs/restore. See plan.md §12.
notes: Added Editor revisions sidebar: lists snapshots via /api/fs/revisions and supports restore via /api/fs/restore, with confirmation and refresh.

title: Classes + sessions + artifacts UI
description: Implement courses list and class detail (sessions timeline, artifacts list, generated summaries + notes). See plan.md §11.
notes:
Implement /api/courses + class detail endpoints and new web routes (/classes, /classes/:slug) with sessions timeline + artifacts list + links into editor.
Added server library scanner + endpoints (GET /api/courses, GET /api/courses/:slug, GET /api/artifacts/extracted) and web Classes dashboard with session timeline, artifact list, extracted preview modal, and editor deep-linking. See commits f4d4feb and 197345e.

title: Task extraction + approval workflow
description: LLM extracts suggested tasks → UI approval → persist tasks and show per course. See plan.md §7.2 step 9.
notes:
Add suggest_tasks job + tasks table, OpenAI Responses API client using OAuth/API-key auth, and per-session task suggestions UI with approve/dismiss.
Implemented tasks extraction pipeline: new tasks table + /api/tasks CRUD, /api/tasks/suggest enqueues suggest_tasks job, OpenAI Responses API JSON-schema calls via OAuth/API-key auth, and UI in class session view to suggest/refresh/approve/dismiss/mark-done tasks. See commits 92396d9 and 584c8e8.

title: Calendar MVP (schedule + Zoom + .ics import)
description: Managed per-course schedule + Zoom join URL/meeting ID; optional .ics import; no external sync. See plan.md §14.

title: Observability: queue + filtered logs + progress
description: Expose queue depth/failures on Overview; job progress streaming; log filtering. See plan.md §10-11.
notes:
Add queue observability: jobs stats endpoint, jobs page with filters, and log filters + pause/live controls in Logs view.
Added job observability: /api/jobs/stats and /api/jobs type filtering; new Queue page with stats + filters + auto-refresh; Overview shows queue counters; Logs page adds level/search filters, pause/resume, and clear. See commits 03d39e6 and 78e4c47.

title: Security hardening (FS + Markdown + secrets)
description: Enforce FS allowlists + traversal protection, safe Markdown preview (no raw HTML), never log secrets. See coding-style.md.

title: Unit tests (core extraction + naming)
description: Unit tests: naming/date parsing, VTT cleaning, PPTX extraction, dedupe, markdown rendering. See plan.md §10.

title: Server API skeleton
description: Server skeleton: /api/status, settings, logs, SSE, fs list/read/write/revisions/restore.
notes: Implemented (Elysia skeleton + fs endpoints).

title: Integration tests (pipeline smoke)
description: Focused integration tests for ingest → copy+meta → summary generation → UI listing where feasible. See plan.md §10.2.

title: Fix Codex outputSchema (structured JSON)
description: Codex app-server expects outputSchema to be the JSON Schema object itself (not {name,schema}). Current suggest_tasks fails with 'schema must be type object got None'. Fix Codex provider to send outputSchema: schema.
notes: Fixed Codex provider to pass the JSON Schema object directly as turn/start.outputSchema (Codex auto-names it codex_output_schema). This resolves suggest_tasks 400 invalid_json_schema (schema type None). Commit: 5b85760.

title: Add Clean Slate reset (state + Unified)
description: Provide a safe 'Clean Slate' action in Settings to wipe local state (jobs/tasks/cache/logs/revisions) and optionally wipe the Unified library contents, then reset watcher dedupe so ingestion can restart cleanly. Should default to disabling ingestion after reset.
notes: Added /api/admin/reset endpoint + Settings UI 'Danger Zone' Clean Slate reset. Reset clears jobs/tasks/cache/logs/revisions, disables ingestion by default, and can optionally wipe Unified contents (requires folder name includes 'Unified' + confirmation). Watcher now supports resetSession to clear stability + dedupe so re-ingestion works without restart. Commits: c126267, b116abc.

title: Improve course detection from watch roots
description: Current courseFromSourcePath uses immediate parent folder, which misclassifies deep folders (e.g., Powerpoints, Homework). Change watcher/scan to include watchRoot, then derive course from first meaningful segment under the root (skipping generic buckets like transcripts/slides). Fall back to parent/inbox.
notes: Improved course detection to reduce random 'classes': watcher now includes watchRoot in ingest_file payload; ingest derives course from first meaningful directory under the watch root (skipping generic buckets like 'Powerpoints', 'Homework', etc) and strips leading Zoom-style date/time prefixes (e.g., '2026-02-02 15.48.46 The Bionic Human' -> 'The Bionic Human'). Fallback remains parent directory. Commit: 4a7c284.

title: Fix Codex agentMessage parsing + thread/read fallback
description: Codex suggest_tasks can fail with 'Codex returned no agentMessage text' due to mismatched notification method names/types (v2 uses item/agentMessage/delta + item.type=agentMessage). Update Codex provider parsing and add thread/read includeTurns fallback for reliable retrieval of final JSON.
notes: Fixed Codex provider to match app-server v2 notifications: accepts item/agentMessage/delta, treats item.type=agentMessage as assistant output, and adds thread/read(includeTurns=true) fallback to fetch final agentMessage text reliably after turn completion. Improves error text with threadId/turnId context.

title: Tasks page + show approved tasks
description: Approved tasks currently disappear because session view only fetches suggested. Add Tasks page with per-course todo lists and update session view to show Approved/Todo tasks alongside Suggested.

title: Session summarization (Codex-first)
description: Implement summarize_session job + UI button to generate a session summary markdown file under Unified/<course>/generated/sessions/<date>/session-summary.md using Codex structured output (JSON->Markdown). Summary link should open generated content, not just a blank editor.
notes: Implemented summarize_session job (Codex-first structured output JSON->Markdown) writing to Unified/<course>/generated/sessions/<date>/session-summary.md. Added POST /api/sessions/summarize and UI button 'Generate Summary' on session page; Summary link still opens editor.

title: Web UI skeleton + editor MVP
description: Dashboard skeleton: Overview/Logs/Settings + Editor (Markdown + preview) with Catppuccin Mocha + Lavender.
notes: Implemented (React/Vite UI + editor).

title: Beads integration (AGENTS + tracking)
description: Ensure Beads workflow pointers exist in AGENTS.md and .beads/issues.jsonl remains trackable.
notes: AGENTS.md updated; root .gitignore no longer ignores .beads/.

title: Job model + queue (SQLite)
description: Implement SQLite job model + queue (queued/running/succeeded/failed/blocked), retries/backoff, persistence in local state dir. See plan.md §7.
notes: Implemented SQLite-backed job queue with runner and basic APIs: GET /api/jobs, POST /api/jobs/enqueue (noop).

title: Watcher + scan + stability gate
description: Implement file watcher + periodic scan for watch roots, stability gate (size unchanged for N seconds), ignore temp files. See plan.md §7.2.
notes: Implemented periodic scan-based watcher with stability gate (5s) that ignores temp files and enqueues ingest jobs. Added /api/watch and /api/watch/scan.

title: Canonical copy + naming + meta sidecar
description: Copy artifacts into Unified/raw/<YYYY>/<YYYY-MM-DD>/ with canonical names and .meta.json sidecar (sha256, source, extractor, version). See plan.md §5.
notes: Implemented ingest_file handler: canonical copy into Unified/<course>/raw/<YYYY>/<YYYY-MM-DD>/ with canonical naming and .meta.json (sha256, sourcePath, detected course/date, kind). Added ingestEnabled setting (default false) and watcher only enqueues when enabled.

title: Transcript extraction (.vtt/.txt/.md)
description: Transcript extraction: VTT cleaning (strip timestamps, keep speakers), normalize txt/md. Cache extracted text + stats. See plan.md §8.
notes: Implemented transcript extraction: VTT cue cleanup + txt/md normalization in @syllabusops/core. Added extract_transcript job that writes cleaned text + stats to state cache and is enqueued after ingest_file for transcript artifacts.

title: PPTX extraction (slides + notes)
description: PPTX extraction: parse slide XML and notesSlides XML; preserve slide numbers + notes association. See plan.md §8.
notes: Implemented PPTX extraction (slide + notes text) via zip parsing (fflate) into @syllabusops/core. Added extract_pptx job that caches JSON + text output, enqueued after ingest_file for .pptx artifacts.

title: Fix job retries: claim failed jobs with backoff
description: Jobs marked failed never retry because runner only claims queued. Include failed in claimNext (respect next_run_at and max_attempts) and use exponential backoff based on attempts.
notes:
Update claimNext to include failed jobs where next_run_at <= now and attempts < max_attempts; compute exponential backoff in fail().
Runner now retries failed jobs: claimNext includes failed jobs when next_run_at <= now and attempts < max_attempts; fail() sets exponential backoff delay (max 10m).

title: Format timestamps in UI (local timezone)
description: Display timestamps (Overview now, Settings savedAt) in human-readable local time instead of raw ISO.
notes:
Add a small date formatting helper using Intl.DateTimeFormat and update OverviewPage + SettingsPage to display local human-readable timestamps.
Added formatLocalTimeOnYmd() helper and updated OverviewPage + SettingsPage to display timestamps in local human-readable format (e.g. '5:35 PM on 2026-06-01') instead of raw ISO.

title: Fix Codex turn output parsing
description: Codex provider expects item/agentMessage events; actual app-server emits item/delta and item/completed with assistantMessage plus turn/completed contains status/error. Fix parsing so suggest_tasks works and reports failures correctly.
notes: Updated Codex provider to match app-server notifications: parse item/delta + item/completed assistantMessage content; read turn/completed status/error and surface failures instead of 'no agentMessage text'.

title: Codex app-server provider (ChatGPT auth)
description: Add LLM provider that routes JSON-schema calls through local Codex app-server using ChatGPT-managed auth (Codex OAuth), and wire into suggest_tasks job + Settings UI provider selector.
notes:
Implement minimal JSON-RPC client for  (initialize, account/read, thread/start, turn/start with outputSchema) and add Settings UI to select provider + connect status. Use Codex provider for suggest_tasks when selected.
Implemented Codex app-server JSON-RPC client + Codex LLM provider option. Server exposes /api/auth/codex/status|start|logout and uses Codex provider for suggest_tasks when selected. Web Settings adds provider selector and Codex connect/logout UI.

title: LLM settings: reasoning effort + model picker
description: Add Settings controls for OpenAI reasoning effort (low/medium/high) and max output tokens; add OpenAI models picker (fetch /models) and use these settings in suggest_tasks.
notes:
Add openaiReasoningEffort + llmMaxOutputTokens to settings; server endpoint to list /models; Settings UI with dropdowns and wire into suggest_tasks.
Added settings for llmMaxOutputTokens + openaiReasoningEffort; server /api/openai/models to fetch available models (auth required); Settings UI adds max tokens control, OpenAI model input with Load models (datalist), and reasoning effort dropdown; wired into suggest_tasks OpenAI calls.
Added Codex models + reasoning effort dropdowns in Settings; server exposes /api/codex/models and codexEffort is passed to codex turn/start.

title: README: default Unified path
description: Adjust README first-time setup to recommend using the default Unified folder name, with optional Unified_Clean for fresh starts.
notes: Updated README to recommend default Unified folder name, with optional Unified_Clean for fresh starts; added gitignore for archived local state dirs.

title: Watcher should ignore Unified output folder
description: Prevent recursive ingestion when watchRoots include a parent of unifiedDir (e.g., watching School/ while Unified is inside). scanOnce should skip unifiedDir and stateDir.
notes:
Add ignoreAbsPrefixes to scanOnce and wire watcher to exclude current unifiedDir + stateDir.
scanOnce now supports ignoreAbsPrefixes; watcher passes unifiedDir + stateDir to prevent recursive ingestion when watchRoots include parent folders.

title: Rewrite README for students + usage
description: Update root README.md with exciting, student-friendly product description, feature list, and step-by-step usage without losing technical docs.
notes: Rewrote README.md with student-friendly product overview, feature breakdown, AI provider options (Codex vs OpenAI API), and step-by-step usage while retaining technical docs.

title: Default LLM provider to Codex

notes: Changed settings defaults so llmProvider defaults to codex and codexModel defaults to gpt-5.2-codex; Settings UI provider dropdown defaults to Codex while loading.

title: Fix Codex app-server JSON-RPC protocol + startup race
description: Fix Codex app-server integration to match protocol docs (no jsonrpc field, correct response shapes) and remove 'codex.app_server not started' race.
notes:
Update JSON-RPC framing to omit jsonrpc field, parse codex app-server response shapes per docs, and make JsonRpcLineClient restart when writer missing.
Fixed JSON-RPC framing for codex app-server (omit jsonrpc, always include params), added restart logic for missing-stdin race, and updated response parsing for thread/turn ids. Verified initialize+account/read with a local probe.
